name: Condor Public License v1.1
body:
Condor Public License

Version 1.1, October 30, 2003

Madison, WI. All Rights Reserved. For more information contact: Condor Team, Attention: Professor
Miron Livny, Dept of Computer Sciences, 1210 W. Dayton St., Madison, WI 53706-1685, (608) 262-0856 or
miron@cs.wisc.edu.

This software referred to as the Condor® Version 6.x software ("Software") was developed by the Condor

For more information on the Condor Project, please see http://www.condorproject.org/.

Installation, use, reproduction, display, modification and redistribution of this Software, with or

1. Redistributions of this Software, with or without modification, must reproduce this Condor Public

2. Any user documentation included with a redistribution must include the following notice:"This product includes software from the Condor® Project (http://www.condorproject.org/)"Alternatively, if that is where third-party acknowledgments normally appear, this
acknowledgment must be reproduced in the Software itself.

3. Any academic report, publication, or other academic disclosure of results obtained with this

this Software without the prior written approval, obtainable via email to

patent license shall not apply to any other combinations which include the Software. No

6. DISCLAIMERTHIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS AND THE UNIVERSITY "AS

7. LIMITATION OF LIABILITYTHE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS AND ANY OTHER OFFICER, AGENT, OR EMPLOYEE OF THE
UNIVERSITY SHALL HAVE NO LIABILITY TO LICENSEE OR OTHER PERSONS FOR DIRECT, INDIRECT,

8. Certain uses and transfers of the Software or documentation, and/or items or software

9. The Condor Team may publish revised and/or new versions of this Condor Public License (``this
